data.title: District OR
data.text:
In an effort to keep Board of Education Meeting notices at your fingertips, we will begin posting all notices in this document, and we will keep it indefinitely on our front page.

Please note, you can find the official Minutes and Minutes by clicking the following link: Official Board Agendas and Minutes

-----

2024-2025

District OR-1: Board of Education Regular Meeting Notice:

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that a Regular Meeting of the Board of Education of School District OR-1 Otoe County, Nebraska will be held at Palmyra High School in the media center in Palmyra, NE on Monday, September 9, 2024 at 7:00 p.m. Such meetings will be open to the public. An agenda for such a meeting, kept continuously current, is available for public inspection at the Office of the Superintendent.

-----

2023-2024

District OR-1: Board of Education Special Meeting Notice:

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that a Special Meeting of the Board of Education of School District OR-1 Otoe County, Nebraska will be held at Palmyra High School in the media center in Palmyra, NE on Monday, August 12, 2024 at 6:30 p.m. This special meeting is to discuss and approve construction-related expenditures related to the 2022 bond. Such meetings will be open to the public. An agenda for such a meeting, kept continuously current, is available for public inspection at the Office of the Superintendent.

-----

District OR-1: Board of Education Regular Meeting Notice:

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that a Regular Meeting of the Board of Education of School District OR-1 Otoe County, Nebraska will be held at Palmyra High School in the media center in Palmyra, NE on Monday, August 12, 2024 at 7:00 p.m. Such meetings will be open to the public. An agenda for such a meeting, kept continuously current, is available for public inspection at the Office of the Superintendent.

-----

District OR-1: Board of Education Public Notice for Parental / Community Involvement in Schools: Policy # 6400

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that a public hearing will be held on Thursday, July 11th, 2024 beginning at 6:50 p.m. in the media center at Palmyra High School to discuss the Parental / Community Involvement in Schools Policy #6400. An agenda for such meeting, kept continuously current, is available for public inspection at the Office of the Superintendent.

-----

District OR-1: Board of Education Public Notice for Student Fees: Policy #5416

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that a public hearing will be held on Thursday, July 11th, 2024 to discuss the Student Fees Policy #5416. This public hearing will begin immediately following the Parental / Community Involvement in Schools Policy #6400 public hearing which starts at 6:50 p.m. on Thursday, July 11th, 2024. This public hearing will take place in the media center at Palmyra High School. An agenda for such a meeting, kept continuously current, is available for public inspection at the Office of the Superintendent.

-----

District OR-1: Board of Education Special Meeting Notice:

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that a Special Meeting of the Board of Education of School District OR-1 Otoe County, Nebraska will be held at Palmyra High School in the media center in Palmyra, NE on Thursday, July 11, 2024 at 6:30 p.m. This special meeting is to discuss and approve construction-related expenditures related to the 2022 bond. Such meetings will be open to the public. An agenda for such a meeting, kept continuously current, is available for public inspection at the Office of the Superintendent.

-----

District OR-1: Board of Education Regular Meeting Notice:

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that a Regular Meeting of the Board of Education of School District OR-1 Otoe County, Nebraska will be held at Palmyra High School in the media center in Palmyra, NE on Thursday, July 11, 2024 at 7:00 p.m. Such meetings will be open to the public. An agenda for such a meeting, kept continuously current, is available for public inspection at the Office of the Superintendent.

-----

District OR-1: Public Notice of Non-Public Consultation Meeting

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that on Wednesday, June 12th, 2024, at 12:00 p.m. a meeting conducted by District OR-1 Public Schools will take place at the District OR-1 Palmyra School Office of the Superintendent located at 425 F. Street in Palmyra, Nebraska.

The purpose of the meeting will be to provide an opportunity for parents and representatives of nonpublic schools to participate in the development of a plan for providing special education services to children with disabilities who attend nonpublic schools and home schools which are within the District OR-1 Public School district for the 2024-2025 school year.

Parents of a home-schooled child or a child attending a nonpublic school who has been or may be identified with a disability and attend a nonpublic school within the boundaries of District OR-1 Public Schools, may attend. If you have further questions pertaining to this meeting, please contact Mr. Michael Hart (Superintendent of Schools) at (402) 780-5327.

-----

District OR-1: Board of Education Special Meeting Notice:

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that a Special (CMAR) Meeting of the Board of Education of School District OR-1 Otoe County, Nebraska will be held at Palmyra High School in the media center in Palmyra, NE on Monday, June 10, 2024, at 6:30 p.m. This special meeting is to discuss and approve construction-related expenditures related to the 2022 bond. Such meetings will be open to the public. An agenda for such a meeting, kept continuously current, is available for public inspection at the Office of the Superintendent.

An agenda for such a meeting, kept continuously current, is available for public inspection at the Office of the Superintendent.

An agenda for such meeting, kept continuously current, is available for public inspection at the Office of the Superintendent.
